amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the repeal of the District of Columbia's Local Budget Autonomy Amendment Act of 2012.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 196 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike the repeal of the District of Columbia's Local Budget Autonomy Amendment Act of 2012.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A162) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 222 (Roll no. 520).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A162) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 222 (Roll no. 520).
